attributes.action: "Restore the authentic Memoirs of King George III to the history of England-This Chapter of the history of England has been re-written."
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The authentic Memoirs of King George III have been suppressed for 150 years, because they are not in the interests of the Royal Family.  The Memoirs substantiate the 'Royal Bigamy'; the Royal Family are neither the rightful nor lawful heirs to the Throne, technically.  Please sign the petition, if you feel that Englishmen have a right to know the history of their own country  (I, Martin Ball of Weymouth re-discovered King George III's authentic Memoirs)
